verses.verse: I charge <S%G1263><s%> you therefore <S%G3767><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> and the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> shall judge <S%G2919><s%> the quick <S%G2198><s%> and the dead <S%G3498><s%> at <S%G2596><s%> his appearing <S%G2015><s%> and his kingdom; <S%G932><s%>

Preach <S%G2784><s%> the word; <S%G3056><s%> be instant <S%G2186><s%> in season, <S%G2121><s%> out of season; <S%G171><s%> reprove, <S%G1651><s%> rebuke, <S%G2008><s%> exhort <S%G3870><s%> with all <S%G3956><s%> long-suffering <S%G3115><s%> and doctrine. <S%G1322><s%>

For the time <S%G2540><s%> will come <S%G1511><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> they will not endure <S%G430><s%> sound <S%G5198><s%> doctrine; <S%G1319><s%> but after <S%G2596><s%> their own <S%G2398><s%> lusts <S%G1939><s%> shall they heap <S%G2002><s%> to themselves <S%G1438><s%> teachers, <S%G1320><s%> having itching <S%G2833><s%> ears; <S%G189><s%>
And they shall turn <S%G654><s%> away <S%G654><s%> their ears <S%G189><s%> from the truth, <S%G225><s%> and shall be turned <S%G654><s%> to fables. <S%G3454><s%>

But watch <S%G3525><s%> you in all <S%G3956><s%> things, endure <S%G2553><s%> afflictions, <S%G2553><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> the work <S%G2041><s%> of an evangelist, <S%G2099><s%> make <S%G4135><s%> full <S%G4135><s%> proof <S%G4135><s%> of your ministry. <S%G1248><s%>
For I am now <S%G2236><s%> ready <S%G4689><s%> to be offered, <S%G4689><s%> and the time <S%G2540><s%> of my departure <S%G359><s%> is at <S%G2186><s%> hand. <S%G2186><s%>
I have fought <S%G75><s%> a good <S%G2570><s%> fight, <S%G73><s%> I have finished <S%G5055><s%> my course, <S%G1408><s%> I have kept <S%G5083><s%> the faith: <S%G4102><s%>

From now on <S%G3063><s%> there is laid <S%G606><s%> up for me a crown <S%G4735><s%> of righteousness, <S%G1343><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> the righteous <S%G1342><s%> judge, <S%G2923><s%> shall give <S%G591><s%> me at <S%G1722><s%> that day: <S%G2250><s%> and not to me only, <S%G3440><s%> but to all <S%G3956><s%> them also <S%G2532><s%> that love <S%G25><s%> his appearing. <S%G2015><s%>
Do <S%G4704><s%> your diligence <S%G4704><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> shortly <S%G5030><s%> to me:

For Demas <S%G1214><s%> has forsaken <S%G1459><s%> me, having loved <S%G25><s%> this <S%G3588><s%> present <S%G3568><s%> world, <S%G165><s%> and is departed <S%G4198><s%> to Thessalonica; <S%G2332><s%> Crescens <S%G2913><s%> to Galatia, <S%G1053><s%> Titus <S%G5103><s%> to Dalmatia. <S%G1149><s%>
Only <S%G3441><s%> Luke <S%G3065><s%> is with me. Take <S%G353><s%> Mark, <S%G3138><s%> and bring <S%G71><s%> him with you: for he is profitable <S%G2173><s%> to me for the ministry. <S%G1248><s%>
And Tychicus <S%G5190><s%> have I sent <S%G649><s%> to Ephesus. <S%G2181><s%>

The cloak <S%G5341><s%> that I left <S%G620><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> Troas <S%G5174><s%> with Carpus, <S%G2591><s%> when you come, <S%G2064><s%> bring <S%G5342><s%> with you, and the books, <S%G975><s%> but especially <S%G3122><s%> the parchments. <S%G3200><s%>

Alexander <S%G223><s%> the coppersmith <S%G5471><s%> did <S%G1731><s%> me much <S%G4183><s%> evil: <S%G2556><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> reward <S%G591><s%> him according <S%G2596><s%> to his works: <S%G2041><s%>
Of whom <S%G3739><s%> be you ware <S%G5442><s%> also; <S%G2532><s%> for he has greatly <S%G3029><s%> withstood <S%G436><s%> our words. <S%G3056><s%>

At <S%G1722><s%> my first <S%G4413><s%> answer <S%G627><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> stood <S%G4836><s%> with me, but all <S%G3956><s%> men forsook <S%G1459><s%> me: I pray God that it may not be laid <S%G3049><s%> to their charge. <S%G3049><s%>

Notwithstanding the Lord <S%G2962><s%> stood <S%G3936><s%> with me, and strengthened <S%G1743><s%> me; that by me the preaching <S%G2782><s%> might be fully <S%G4135><s%> known, <S%G4135><s%> and that all <S%G3956><s%> the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> might hear: <S%G191><s%> and I was delivered <S%G4506><s%> out of the mouth <S%G4750><s%> of the lion. <S%G3023><s%>

And the Lord <S%G2962><s%> shall deliver <S%G4506><s%> me from every <S%G3956><s%> evil <S%G4190><s%> work, <S%G2041><s%> and will preserve <S%G4982><s%> me to his heavenly <S%G2032><s%> kingdom: <S%G932><s%> to whom <S%G3739><s%> be glory <S%G1391><s%> for ever <S%G165><s%> and ever. <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>
Salute <S%G782><s%> Prisca <S%G4251><s%> and Aquila, <S%G207><s%> and the household <S%G3624><s%> of Onesiphorus. <S%G3683><s%>
Erastus <S%G2037><s%> stayed <S%G3306><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> Corinth: <S%G2882><s%> but Trophimus <S%G5161><s%> have I left <S%G620><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> Miletum <S%G3399><s%> sick. <S%G770><s%>

Do <S%G4704><s%> your diligence <S%G4704><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> winter. <S%G5494><s%> Eubulus <S%G2103><s%> greets <S%G782><s%> you, and Pudens, <S%G4227><s%> and Linus, <S%G3044><s%> and Claudia, <S%G2803><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> the brothers. <S%G80><s%>

The Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> be with your spirit. <S%G4151><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> be with you. Amen. <S%G281><s%> The second epistle unto Timotheus, ordained the first bishop of the church of the Ephesians, was written from Rome, when Paul was brought before Nero the second time.
